actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to permit the Secretary of the Interior to enter certain leases for fire capitalization improvements.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to use funds made available to control wildland fires: (1) to enter into non-competitive sole source leases of real property with local governments, at or below fair market value, to construct capitalized improvements for fire facilities on such leased properties; and (2) to make advanced payments for any such lease or for construction activity associated with the lease.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Secretary of the Interior to enter certain leases for fire capitalization improvements.
